source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a beautiful aerial shot of Venice, Italy, at sunrise. The video showcases the iconic Doge's Palace and St. Mark's Square, featuring the famous column topped with the statue of the winged Lion of Venice. The camera moves to provide sweeping, panoramic views of the historic location and the adjacent waterfront with moored gondolas.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This is a beautiful aerial shot of Venice, Italy, at sunrise. The video showcases the iconic Doge's Palace and St. Mark's Square, featuring the famous column topped with the statue of the winged Lion of Venice. The camera moves to provide sweeping, panoramic views of the historic location and the adjacent waterfront with moored gondolas.

generated_critique: The caption uses the subjective adjective "beautiful" and contains introductory phrases like "This is a..." and "The video showcases..." which should be removed. The description of the camera's motion as "moves to provide sweeping, panoramic views" is too generic. The caption should be revised to provide a more specific, chronological description of the camera's movement. It should state that the aerial shot first moves alongside the Doge's Palace before pulling back and rotating around the column with the Lion of Venice, a movement which reveals the full view of St. Mark's Square.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: An aerial shot of Venice, Italy, at sunrise moves alongside the Doge's Palace and the waterfront with its moored gondolas. The camera then pulls back and rotates around the column topped with the winged Lion of Venice, revealing a full view of St. Mark's Square.
